name: ElmI18Next

aliases.name: Translations
aliases.comment: A type that represents your loaded translations

aliases.name: TranslationsJson
aliases.comment: A type that represents undecoded Translations

values.name: fetchTranslations
values.comment: A command to load translation files.
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error ElmI18Next.Translations -> msg) -> String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: initialTranslations
values.comment: Use this to intialize Translations in your model.

values.name: t
values.comment:
Translate a value at a given string.

    -- Use the key.
    t translations "labels.greetings.hello"
